title: GET AS HIGH AS YOU CAN — Complete Prompt Compendium
subject: monkey
global_constraints: Monkey remains the subject (≥35–40% of frame in comics/covers); face readable; tail visible when appropriate.
Glass bong must be crystal-clear borosilicate; preserve exact shape and fine details (bowl, downstem, joint, lip bevel, thin seam, true refraction/IOR, meniscus when visible).
When a style specifies B/W, keep strict monochrome; otherwise follow palette cues.
Respect any layout notes (grids, panels, frames, mastheads, captions).

prompts.name: Swiss Grid Poster
prompts.prompt: Bold grotesk title top-aligned on strict baseline grid. Minimal silhouette of a leaping monkey holding a clear glass bong with accurate refraction and rim highlights. Two-tone palette (burnt orange + carbon black), negative space, micro-grain paper texture.

prompts.name: Ukiyo-e Woodblock
prompts.prompt: Hand-carved banner title. Windswept macaque mid-jump; crystal-clear bong rendered with woodblock water ripples and subtle mica sparkle; indigo clouds, off-register ink, visible fiber paper.

prompts.name: Psychedelic ’70s Screenprint
prompts.prompt: Wavy bubble serif title. Funky dancing monkey holding a pristine glass bong with rainbow refractions; saturated magenta, acid lime, tangerine split-fountain blend; heavy halftone, misprint edges.

prompts.name: Soviet Constructivist
prompts.prompt: Condensed geometric slab title in red banners. Angular heroic monkey silhouette ascending geometric stairs, gripping a perfectly proportioned transparent bong. Red/black/cream palette; arrows and radial burst.

prompts.name: Y2K Chrome 3D
prompts.prompt: Extruded chrome masthead with soft bloom. Hyper-clean CGI monkey; bong shows accurate IOR, meniscus, seams. Holographic gradient background; subtle lens flare and DOF.

prompts.name: Bauhaus Print
prompts.prompt: Lowercase geometric sans title. Monkey made of primary shapes; glass bong as precise circles/cylinders with transparent overlays. Red/yellow/blue + off-white; letterpress indentation.

prompts.name: Noir Engraving
prompts.prompt: Tall condensed serif title. Cross-hatched chiaroscuro: night stage, mid-leap monkey; glass bong etched with fine linework, crisp reflections. Monochrome with subtle vignette.

prompts.name: Vaporwave Collage
prompts.prompt: Retro techno type, scanlines. Neon-lit monkey silhouette above sunset gradient; photo-real clear bong with cyan/pink rim light reflecting a checkerboard floor. VHS noise, Japanese side captions, palm fronds.

prompts.name: Tattoo Flash Sheet
prompts.prompt: Traditional banner ribbon title. Old-school inked monkey; bong with clean linework and accurate geometry. Limited palette (black, red, hunter green); tea-stained paper, stipple shading.

prompts.name: Stop-Motion Clay Diorama
prompts.prompt: Chunky hand-cut letters title. Clay-sculpted monkey mid-jump; real miniature borosilicate bong with true proportions and seam line. Soft box set, shallow DOF, felt ground.

prompts.name: Art Nouveau Poster
prompts.prompt: Ornate lithograph: flowing fur lines; bong refraction + gold rim highlights. Sepia–sage–copper grade; tall decorative sans; floral border medallions; title crowns the leap.

prompts.name: Pixel Art Cartridge
prompts.prompt: 32×32-style cover. Monkey sprite mid-air with perfect bong outline pixels (bowl/downstem visible). NES palette with dithering; bitmap title; CRT bloom.

prompts.name: Graffiti Stencil Wall
prompts.prompt: Stencil silhouette leap on brick; over-spray halo. Bong contour marked with paint-pen speculars; neon orange accents; hand-scrawled caps; sticker cluster.

prompts.name: Scientific Blueprint
prompts.prompt: Cyan blueprint plates. Dimension lines on bong (joint angle, tube radius); orthographic views; hatching for fur; title as drafting block.

prompts.name: Surrealist Desert
prompts.prompt: Dreamscape oil: elongated shadows, glass caustics on sand. Ultramarine + ochre; tiny mirage title; vast negative space.

prompts.name: Memphis Milano
prompts.prompt: Geometric pop design. Monkey abstracted to zigzags; bong stays photo-exact. Cyan/magenta/yellow/black; playful grid cutouts.

prompts.name: Cyanotype Print
prompts.prompt: Prussian blue mono sun print. White silhouette noise; bright rim light on bong; deckled paper border.

prompts.name: Brutalist Type Poster
prompts.prompt: Maximal heavy grotesk masthead; minimal emblematic figure. Tiny monkey + exact bong anchored bottom-right; micro-grain; accent orange.

prompts.name: Pop Art Ben-Day
prompts.prompt: Comic pop silkscreen. Dot fields 20–40 LPI; crisp bong outline with starbursts; CMYK primaries, thick keyline; speech-bubble microcopy; four-panel grid ending on leap.

prompts.name: Origami Paper-Craft
prompts.prompt: Studio photo of paper diorama. Folded-paper monkey; real mini borosilicate bong with true joints; pastel backdrop; shallow DOF; paper banner title.

prompts.name: Art Deco Travel Poster
prompts.prompt: Gilded litho: stepped sunbursts; metallic ink edge on glass. Champagne/obsidian/teal; tall inline Deco caps; ziggurat framing.

prompts.name: Sumi-e Ink Wash
prompts.prompt: Japanese brush painting. Dry-brush fur; single white stroke for bong glare; black ink on rice paper; red seal; big empty sky.

prompts.name: Cubist Collage
prompts.prompt: Papier-collé angular planes; faceted limbs. Bong stays geometrically exact via transparent vellum layers; muted ochres/slate/green; angled strips title.

prompts.name: Retro-Futurist Googie
prompts.prompt: Jet-Age roadside graphic. Boomerang shapes; chrome pinstripe on bong; aqua/coral/avocado; space-age script + block caps.

prompts.name: Single-Line Minimalism
prompts.prompt: Continuous contour monkey; separate precise outline for bong + tiny specular dots; warm off-white; thin grotesk micro-caps; vast negative space.

prompts.name: Low-Poly Isometric Diorama
prompts.prompt: Stylized CGI. Triangulated monkey; physically correct clear-glass shader on bong; floating isometric platform; blocky iso shadowed title.

prompts.name: Glitchcore / Datamosh
prompts.prompt: Corrupted VHS/CRT: scanline tear, RGB split. Bong edges remain perfectly crisp as a protected layer; neon magenta/cyan on black; bitmap techno type.

prompts.name: High-Speed Strobe Photograph
prompts.prompt: Edgerton-style freeze: micro droplets, razor-sharp caustics in the bong. Neutral studio gray; condensed sans captioning; 1/10,000s freeze.

prompts.name: Tarot / Occult Engraving
prompts.prompt: Copperplate etch with mystical border. Bong etched with cross-hatch reflections; parchment; medieval caps title as card name; Major Arcana layout.

prompts.name: Mid-Century Children’s Gouache
prompts.prompt: Mary-Blair-ish storybook. Chunky shapes, soft dry-brush; bong rendered simply but precise with rim sparkle; coral/mustard/sky; playful foliage.

prompts.name: Ligne Claire Comic Plate
prompts.prompt: Franco-Belgian clear-line. Flat colors, crisp black outline; bong with thin ink lines + highlight ovals. Pastel sky, brick red, navy. 3 panels culminating in jump under big title.

prompts.name: Natural History Field Guide
prompts.prompt: 19th-century scientific plate. Anatomical callouts; bong shown in exact elevation with gloss hatching; tea-stained parchment; engraved headline.

prompts.name: Risograph Two-Color Zine
prompts.prompt: Soy-ink riso print. Registration offset; bong edge in fluorescent spot with white specular; federal blue + fluorescent orange; grainy gradients.

prompts.name: Stained-Glass Window (Vitrail)
prompts.prompt: Leaded glass illustration. Monkey in colored panes; bong as clear bevelled glass with authentic refraction seams; jewel tones; gothic banner title.

prompts.name: ’90s Anime Cel
prompts.prompt: Hand-painted acetate. Sharp cel lines, smear frame; bong ultra-clean with painted highlights + transparent multiply pass; teal sunset; speed lines.

prompts.name: Photoreal Wildlife Documentary
prompts.prompt: High-speed nature poster. Fine fur, motion grit; bong with IOR, water meniscus, micro-scratches; golden-hour grade; sober grotesk.

prompts.name: Generative Vector Field
prompts.prompt: Algorithmic flow-lines form the silhouette; photoreal bong overlaid, perfectly aligned; graphite lines on warm paper; minimal micro-caps.

prompts.name: ASCII/Terminal Poster
prompts.prompt: Monospaced character art background forming the monkey; bong as crisp vector overlay. Phosphor green on black; DOS bitmap headline; terminal frame.

prompts.name: Dada Photomontage
prompts.prompt: Collage of newsprint and stamps; bong is a cut-out product photo kept perfectly true with pinned label. Desaturated newsprint with scarlet accents; ransom-note title.

prompts.name: Bioluminescent Night Jungle
prompts.prompt: Long-exposure light-painting. Neon edge light on fur; bong catches blue-green biolum glow and casts caustics on leaves; indigo/cyan LUT; glowing sans title.

prompts.name: Dutch Golden Age Vanitas Still-Life
prompts.prompt: Baroque oil: candlelit chiaroscuro; textured fur brushwork; crystal bong with true IOR, meniscus, lip bevel, micro-scratches; oak tabletop caustics. Gilded plaque-like title.

prompts.name: Silver Age Superhero Burst (1963)
prompts.prompt: 3 panels, thick keylines, Ben-Day dots. P1 stoop with clear bong; P2 lightning ‘ZAP!’ refracts in the bong; P3 triumphant skyline leap ‘SWOOSH!’ Optimistic captions.

prompts.name: Shōnen 4-Koma Vertical
prompts.prompt: 4 vertical gags: inspect exact bong; inhale ‘GOKU-GOKU’; chibi power-up; mid-air fist-pump under banner title. Screen-tones + speed lines.

prompts.name: Gekiga Noir Triptych
prompts.prompt: Three wide B/W panels: alley hand study on glass; reflection shows fire escape; roofline leap through searchlight; grim serif title.

prompts.name: Sunday Funnies (3×1 Strip)
prompts.prompt: Pastel line. Ponder bong; ‘PUFF-PUFF’ cloud forms staircase; climbs smoke stairs and jumps; ribbon headline; corner punchline.

prompts.name: EC Horror Pre-Code (mini story)
prompts.prompt: Graveyard; bong glints on rim; skeletons rise; twist: monkey rockets skyward; narrator pun: “He took the highest road!”

prompts.name: Moebius-esque Euro SF (mini story)
prompts.prompt: Pastel desert, airy line. Bong shimmers, gravity lightens; sand grains sparkle via refraction; serene ascent; small-caps title.

prompts.name: Underground Comix ’70s (mini story)
prompts.prompt: Cross-hatch grime. Talking wall heckles; inhale; psychedelic bloom; airborne grin; crude hand-lettered title.

prompts.name: Archie-Style Teen Humor
prompts.prompt: Candy colors. Late for class; trip—‘WHOA!’; trampoline bounce to rafters; pep squad cheers; wholesome pun.

prompts.name: Vertical Webtoon (6 beats)
prompts.prompt: Tall scroll: street trudge; macro waterline in bong; inhale; shoes ‘fwip’; mid-air city lights; topper card title.

prompts.name: Scratchboard Noir (mini story)
prompts.prompt: White-on-black scratchboard: hand study with lip bevel; crouch coil; explosive leap silhouette; smoke ribbon forms title.

prompts.name: Silver Age Burst (1962)
prompts.prompt: CMYK flats, thick keylines, Ben-Day; corner box head; Comics-Code seal. Monkey rockets over skyline; bong gleams with safe sparkle; action blurbs.

prompts.name: Ligne Claire Album (cover)
prompts.prompt: Clean flat-color courtyard; panel-within-cover showing leap; final pose frozen; pastel/navy/red; album number.

prompts.name: Pop Art Silkscreen (cover)
prompts.prompt: Giant halftone silhouette; precise bong outlined with starbursts; CMYK primaries; on-cover SFX and bold masthead.

prompts.name: Gekiga Noir (base cover)
prompts.prompt: Rooftop at night, spotlight cone; close reflections in bong show a fire escape; high-contrast B/W, rain speckle, cigarette smoke; narrow serif logotype.

prompts.name: Shōnen Jump Action (cover)
prompts.prompt: Low-angle leap, speed lines, aura; bong glints with anime highlight ovals; screen-tones; condensed katakana-inspired Latin; “Issue #1!” badge.

prompts.name: EC Horror Pre-Code (cover)
prompts.prompt: Pulpy inks, lurid palette, ornate coffin frame, aged newsprint. Graveyard leap; icy caustics on stones; dripping masthead.

prompts.name: Euro SF / Moebius Pastel (cover)
prompts.prompt: Quiet desert mesa; gravity lens warps horizon through the bong; serene vertical ascent. Fine airy line, dusty pastels, huge sky negative space; small caps masthead.

prompts.name: Underground Comix ’70s (cover)
prompts.prompt: Warped city block; psychedelic bloom at leap; crosshatch grime; fluorescent spot colors; hand-lettered logo.

prompts.name: Indie Riso Zine (Two-Color cover)
prompts.prompt: Graphic smoke shapes title; bong contour in spot fluorescent; federal blue + fluorescent orange; visible registration.

prompts.name: Cyberpunk Neon Variant (cover)
prompts.prompt: Night market; holographic HUD rings around the bong; scanlines, chromatic aberration; techno mono micro labels; foil-stamp logo option.

prompts.name: Golden Age Jungle Adventure (1940)
prompts.prompt: Jungle vista; vine-swinging hero monkey brandishing clear bong. Off-register CMY dots; sunburst; 10¢ price box; slab masthead.

prompts.name: 1950s Romance Parody
prompts.prompt: Close-up teary gaze at bong like a lover; hearts background. Duo-tone rose + navy; script logo; melodramatic cover line.

prompts.name: Sports Manga High-Jump Special
prompts.prompt: Stadium low-angle; clearing bar with bong tucked like a baton; speed lines, chalk dust; tall shōnen masthead.

prompts.name: Shōjo Sparkle Variant
prompts.prompt: Pastel clouds, floral wreath; starry eyes; big highlight ovals on bong; glitter rim-light; elegant ribbon title.

prompts.name: Painterly Vertigo-Era (1998)
prompts.prompt: Abstract smear of leap; photoreal bong is the sole crisp object; oils/acrylics; muted olives/rust; narrow serif logotype.

prompts.name: Victorian Steampunk Broadsheet
prompts.prompt: Brass rooftops/smokestacks; vaulting from airship rigging; engraved crosshatching, sepia wash; woodtype masthead.

prompts.name: Graffiti Handstyle Variant (cover)
prompts.prompt: Brick wall full-bleed; throw-up cloud; bong outlined with paint-pen speculars; overspray halo; wildstyle tag masthead.

prompts.name: Swiss Modernist Minimal (cover)
prompts.prompt: Huge negative space; tiny precise figure lower-right. Two-color split (safety orange + carbon black); baseline grid; micro credits.

prompts.name: Mondo Screenprint Gig-Poster Crossover
prompts.prompt: Graphic silhouette; starbursts on bong rim. Three inks max (teal/amber/black); trapping visible; custom block logo; AP/50 stamp.

prompts.name: Holographic/Lenticular Cyber Variant
prompts.prompt: Faux lenticular parallax cues; voxel shards around exact bong; scanlines. Techno mono masthead; foil-stamp corner icon.

prompts.name: Heavy Metal Airbrush (1979)
prompts.prompt: Low-angle heroic leap over chrome-meteor desert; stars/nebulae refract through bong. Rich airbrush gradients; metallic masthead.

prompts.name: Horror Manga Spiral Variant
prompts.prompt: Courtyard spirals; smoke vortices skyward; reflections warp in glass. High-contrast B/W, dense tones; distressed narrow serif title.

prompts.name: Moebius Pastel — Hero Close-Up
prompts.prompt: Airy line, dusty pastel sky. Monkey fills middle third in 3/4 leap toward camera; bong foregrounded with accurate geometry; elegant small-caps masthead.

prompts.name: Moebius Pastel — Centered Full-Body Silhouette
prompts.prompt: Huge sky negative space; perfectly centered full silhouette with interior linework; photoreal bong overlaps torso; pale ochre/teal/lilac.

prompts.name: Moebius Pastel — Low-Angle Leap
prompts.prompt: Low camera at mesa edge; monkey dominates foreground; bong raised with crisp rim highlight; small sun disc; minimalist pastel palette.

prompts.name: Moebius Pastel — Profile Run-Up
prompts.prompt: Side-profile sprint; tail trailing; bong hugged close. Long horizontal cover with right-side sky; salmon + celeste grade; micro footer credits.

prompts.name: Moebius Pastel — Perch & Takeoff
prompts.prompt: Crouched on spindly mesa needle; launch moment. Bong forward, transparent walls refracting sky band; desaturated sand, chalk-blue sky.

prompts.name: Moebius Pastel — Vertical Ascent with Lens Warp
prompts.prompt: Calm vertical rise; bong below chest; gentle gravity-lens ripple distorts only the horizon, not anatomy; pastel gradient sky; small-caps title.

prompts.name: Rooftop Close 3/4
prompts.prompt: Rain-lashed night; monkey chest-up fills middle third; pristine bong raised near lens with razor rim highlights and city reflections; cigarette smoke wisps; narrow serif logotype.

prompts.name: Overhead Spotlight Lock
prompts.prompt: Top-down cone of light; full-body crouch, bong across chest with micro reflection of fire escape; heavy blacks, rain needles, puddle sheen; small-caps title above cone.

prompts.name: Edge-of-Roof Coil
prompts.prompt: Low camera at parapet; monkey dominates foreground preparing to leap; bong forward with star speculars; blurred skyline and searchlight arc; narrow serif masthead.

prompts.name: Doorway Burst
prompts.prompt: Rooftop door slams open into rain; chest-up burst; exact bong framed against spotlight ellipse, reflection of staircase; hard chiaroscuro; vertical credits in gutter.

prompts.name: Bridge Truss Silhouette
prompts.prompt: Industrial truss backdrop; mid-leap silhouette with readable face; photoreal bong with clear rim light and refraction; title narrow across top rule.

prompts.name: Fire-Escape Mirror
prompts.prompt: Foreground macro on bong (lip bevel ring, meniscus); background sharp on monkey’s face; fire escape appears only as reflection in glass; diagonal rain.

prompts.name: Searchlight Cross
prompts.prompt: Intersecting spotlights carve an X; chest-up stance; droplets bead on glass; deep blacks, scratch rain; minimal letterspaced title.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway (base noir)
prompts.prompt: Side profile sprint across roof ledge; full body spans half frame; tail trailing. Bong braced close with refraction of signage; gritty halation; narrow serif masthead; tiny corner slug “Noir Issue.”

prompts.name: Gutterline Standoff
prompts.prompt: Framed by twin chimneys; lens slightly long; accurate bong dominates lower-center, reflecting a narrow escape path; rain speckle; small caps logotype.

prompts.name: Leap Through the Cone
prompts.prompt: Decisive mid-air break through spotlight cone; bong lip bevel flashes white ring; background falls to black; austere serif title.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Compressed City
prompts.prompt: Side profile on long ledge with compressed signage; rain rakes diagonally; neon letterforms (as luminance only) refract in bong curve; smoke ribbon crosses headline.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Dutch Pursuit
prompts.prompt: 10–15° tilt; sprint toward frame right; bong braced tight with razor rim highlight; distant patrol light as soft glow; vertical micro credits.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Split-Sign
prompts.prompt: Giant billboard letters bisect background; bong refracts mirrored letter fragments; wet tarpaper; bead-like rain.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Puddle Mirror
prompts.prompt: Low camera; foreground puddle mirrors the leap; bong lip bevel forms bright ring; ripples graze title bar.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Truss Crossing
prompts.prompt: Repeating industrial lattice behind; clearing a gap; clean speculars on bong; spotlight haze grazes masthead.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Chimney Gauntlet
prompts.prompt: Narrow corridor between chimneys; backlit steam; bong refraction shows a sliver of fire escape; barcode in noir placard.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Billboard Glow
prompts.prompt: Vintage hand-painted billboard looms; bong captures serif strokes in perfect curvature; paper tears ghost into black.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Lightning Freeze
prompts.prompt: Sheet lightning; rain needles; mid-stride tail trail; bong throws hard caustics and bright lip ring; coarse film grain.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Rail Yard Blur
prompts.prompt: Far below train = blurred light bar; rooftop ledge sharp; bong contains thin horizontal streak, crisp and undistorted.

prompts.name: Parapet Runway — Crossed Cones
prompts.prompt: Two searchlights form an X; monkey hits the intersection; droplets on glass; clean refraction of crossed beams.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Swiss Grid
prompts.prompt: Rainy rooftop sprint, low angle, hard backlight. Accurate bong catches signage in refraction. Overprint strict white baseline grid; small-caps masthead top-left; micro-credits in gutter; registration marks/crop ticks.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Title Slash
prompts.prompt: Side profile mid-stride; blown rim lights; droplets on bong. Bold diagonal title slashes behind subject; narrow serif masthead rides the slash; tiny corner slug “Noir Issue.”

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Contact Sheet
prompts.prompt: 3–4 frames as fake contact sheet border; one hero frame dominates 60%. Bong lip bevel ring bright; headline as clean caption strip below.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Posterized Blocks
prompts.prompt: Telephoto compression; bong refraction of sign strokes. Overlay two large geometric blocks (white/near-black) windowing the image; masthead knocked out; thin rules map grid.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Blueprint HUD
prompts.prompt: Three-quarter sprint; shallow DOF. Technical callouts around bong (leader lines: “IOR 1.5”, “lip”, “downstem”). Centered small serif masthead; scale bar + “Fig. 01”.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Newspaper Wrap
prompts.prompt: Head-on stride; skyline blur. Faux newspaper front page overlay: masthead as headline; ghosted columns; barcode plate; bong reflection shows fire escape.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Polish-Poster Minimal
prompts.prompt: Stark silhouette with readable face; photoreal bong crisp rim light. One massive white ellipse + thin vertical rule intersect subject; tiny masthead; micro credits along rule.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Puddle Typography
prompts.prompt: Knee-high camera; puddle mirror foreground. Bong highlight ring echoed as circular typographic ornaments around masthead; fine grain, halation; “Noir Issue” coin seal.

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Frame-within-Frame (base)
prompts.prompt: Monkey bursts through bright spotlight cone. Graphic black inner frame sits offset to create tension; masthead sits in outer margin. Small caption arrows to bong’s bowl and downstem (one-word labels).

prompts.name: Photo-Noir Neon Grid Banner
prompts.prompt: Profile sprint across signage; bong refracts letter fragments. Thin white grid only in sky area; masthead on translucent banner; vertical gutter credits.

prompts.name: Offset Matte—Corner Breach
prompts.prompt: Inner black frame shifted low-right; monkey breaks top-left margin; spotlight cone upper-left; arrowed labels on bong; rain needles across matte.

prompts.name: Split Window—Vertical Gutter
prompts.prompt: Tall inner frame aligned left third; sprint right; tail visible; labels: bowl, joint. Tiny “Noir Issue” coin bottom-right.

prompts.name: Gatefold Illusion
prompts.prompt: Double inner frames separated by a hinge gap; hero pose bridges gap; wet tarpaper; labels: downstem, lip; micro credits on hinge.

prompts.name: Contact Border Hero
prompts.prompt: Thick inner border with faux frame numbers and ▲1 marker; chest-up burst in spotlight; bong lip bevel ring bright; arrows: bowl, joint.

prompts.name: Arch Matte Spotlight
prompts.prompt: Inner matte is soft arch echoing the spotlight; low camera; puddle reflection grazes arch; labels: downstem, lip; tiny mono.

prompts.name: Bracketed Thirds
prompts.prompt: Hairline brackets mark thirds; full-body on lower-right hotspot; smoke ribbon crosses masthead margin; labels: bowl, downstem.

prompts.name: Negative Band Title
prompts.prompt: Horizontal inner matte band slices mid-frame; burst upward through it; masthead above in outer margin; labels: joint, lip; paper grain.

prompts.name: Crosshair Registry
prompts.prompt: Thin crosshair reticles at inner frame midpoints; telephoto compression; tail trailing; bong reflection of fire escape; labels: bowl, joint.

prompts.name: Tear-Sheet Edge
prompts.prompt: Inner matte torn lower edge with fiber texture; stride clears tear; droplets bead on bong; labels: downstem, lip; barcode outside inner frame.

prompts.name: Shadow-Box Depth
prompts.prompt: Inner frame carries subtle drop-shadow; three-quarter angle, strong backlight; heavier grain in the shadow; labels: bowl, joint, lip; micro “Noir Issue” slug.
